history.proof: hauto lq: on use: Nat.add_le_mono_l, Nat.le_trans, Nat.le_ge_cases, Nat.le_gt_cases, le_plus_minus, le_plus_r, Nat.add_comm, lt_not_le, Nat.lt_succ_diag_r, cPairProjections, Nat.le_add_r unfold: lt, Init.Nat.add, cPairPi1, cPairPi2, cPair inv: nat.

original: intros a. unfold cPairPi1. rewrite <- Nat.le_pred_l with (n := a) at 1. apply Nat.le_decidable.
